verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H2088>this,<s%> O <S%H3548>priests!<s%> <S%H7181>Give<s%> <S%H7181>heed,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel!<s%> <S%H238>Listen,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king!<s%> For the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> applies to you, For you have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> at <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> And a <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> out on <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>
And the <S%H7846>revolters<s%> have <S%H6009>gone<s%> <S%H6009>deep<s%> in <S%H9597>depravity,<s%> But I will <S%H4148>chastise<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.

I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is not <S%H3582>hidden<s%> from Me; For <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> you have <S%H2181>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> itself.

Their <S%H4611>deeds<s%> will not <S%H5414>allow<s%> them To <S%H7725>return<s%> to their <S%H430>God.<s%> For a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>harlotry<s%> is <S%H7130>within<s%> them, And they do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6030>testifies<s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> him, And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> has <S%H3782>stumbled<s%> with them.

They will <S%H1980>go<s%> with their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds<s%> To <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> but they will not <S%H4672>find<s%> [Him]; He has <S%H2502>withdrawn<s%> from them.

They have <S%H898>dealt<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> For they have <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H2114>illegitimate<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moon<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> them with their <S%H2506>land.<s%>

<S%H8628>Blow<s%> the <S%H7782>horn<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> The <S%H2689>trumpet<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%> <S%H7321>Sound<s%> an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> at Beth-aven: <S%H310>"Behind<s%> you, <S%H1144>Benjamin!<s%>"

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H8433>rebuke;<s%> Among the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> I <S%H3045>declare<s%> what is <S%H539>sure.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H1961>become<s%> like those who <S%H5472>move<s%> a <S%H1366>boundary;<s%> On them I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H5678>wrath<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%>
Therefore I am like a <S%H6211>moth<s%> to <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> And like <S%H7538>rottenness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H4205>wound,<s%> Then <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%> And <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb.<s%> But he is <S%H3808>unable<s%> <S%H3201><s%> to <S%H7495>heal<s%> you, Or to <S%H1455>cure<s%> you of your <S%H4205>wound.<s%>

For I [will be] like a <S%H7826>lion<s%> to <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> And like a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> I, even I, will <S%H2963>tear<s%> to pieces and <S%H1980>go<s%> away, I will <S%H5375>carry<s%> away, and <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>

I will <S%H1980>go<s%> away [and] <S%H7725>return<s%> to My <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H816>acknowledge<s%> their <S%H816>guilt<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> My <S%H6440>face;<s%> In their <S%H9496>affliction<s%> they will <S%H7836>earnestly<s%> <S%H7836>seek<s%> Me.
